## Bcp47.ILanguageChooserOptions interface

Options for [language tag list filter](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.choose.md) functions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ILanguageChooserOptions 
```

## Properties

<table><thead><tr><th>

Property


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[filter?](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.ilanguagechooseroptions.filter.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

'primaryLanguage' \| 'none'


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Indicates how to filter the language list - `'primaryLanguage'` indicates the each primary language should appear only once in the list in its most similar form. A filter value of `'none'` reports all matching variants of any primary language in order of similarity. Default is `'primaryLanguage'`


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[ultimateFallback?](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.ilanguagechooseroptions.ultimatefallback.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string \| [ISubtags](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.isubtags.md) \| [LanguageTag](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ An optional [language specification](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagespec.md) indicating a language to be returned if the filter call would otherwise return an empty list (i.e. no languages match).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[use?](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.ilanguagechooseroptions.use.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

'desiredLanguage' \| 'availableLanguage'


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Indicates whether to return the matching language from the desired list or the available list. Default is `'availableLanguage'`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
